result.arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: Ni nk’uko nyene rero - izo ngingo zitomoye mu vyerekeye agateka k’abakenyezi n’abana - Imana Allah Itomora Aayah n’amabwirizwa yayo ku vyo mukeneye, kugira ngo muyategere muheze muyagendere.
